R, Rstudio, and ggplot2 Sunbok Lee 2019-08-17 Chapter 1 R 1.1 Why R? R is a free open source software. R is a language designed especially for statistical analysis. Many statistical methods are first implemented in R. R provides many tools for publication-quality data visualization (e.g., ggplot2). R provides many tools for data processing (or data wrangling) (e.g., dplyr, tidyr).
